iitb.Model
Class FeatureTypes

java.lang.Object
  iitb.Model.FeatureTypes
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClassPriorFeature, ConcatRegexFeatures, EdgeFeatures, EdgeHistFeatures, EdgeLinearHistFeatures, EndFeatures, FeatureTypesConcat, FeatureTypesEachLabel, FeatureTypesPosition, FeatureTypesSegmentLength, FeatureTypesSegmentLengthPoly2, FeatureTypesWrapper, KnownInOtherState, RegexCountFeatures, StartFeatures, UnknownFeature, WindowFeatures, WordFeatures, WordScoreFeatures
public abstract class FeatureTypes
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Inherit from the FeatureTypes class for creating any kind of feature. You will see various derived classes from them, EdgeFeatures, StartFeatures, etc, etc. The ".id" field of FeatureImpl does not need to be set by the FEatureTypes.next() methods.

See Also:
